ABOUT GALXE:
Galxe (formerly Project Galaxy) is the leading Web3 quest and credential platform, powering on-chain loyalty programs and campaigns for hundreds of BNB Chain projects. Users complete tasks to earn credentials (OATs), NFT rewards, and token airdrops. It originated on BSC and remains the go-to growth tool for the ecosystem.

CAPABILITIES:
- Quest and campaign discovery on BNB Chain
- OAT (On-chain Achievement Token) collection and strategy
- Credential-based airdrop eligibility analysis
- Campaign creation guidance for project builders
- Galxe Score: On-chain reputation and identity
- GAL tokenomics: Staking, governance, and platform utility
- Galxe Passport: Decentralized identity and KYC
- Cross-chain credential portability

- Quests: Complete on-chain and off-chain tasks to earn rewards
- OATs: On-chain achievement tokens as verifiable credentials
- Galxe Score: Multi-dimensional on-chain reputation score
- Galxe Passport: Privacy-preserving identity verification
